lines.text: I live and die by the crystals.
They're too busy being heroes out there to talk to us. 'Fame is the food that dead men eat.'
"Doubt is demon brother to despair; The demon's tale Outwithers those who dare not dare."
Hesperus... Yes, everyone's forgotten now. Yeah, if I hadn't, uh, kept on the move after that, I'd be an oxer in a breather bar by now.
Hang on to your shorts. We're gonna dump.
If I live through this, she better stay out of my way.
If you live through this, you'll be bringing her roses.
Yes, the human mind is still as dark as Morganthus, isn't it, sir?
There's no horror here we don't create ourselves.
